bill_title: revise certain re-employment requirements in the South Dakota Retirement System.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain re-employment requirements in the South Dakota Retirement System. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 3-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any member who is receiving a monthly benefit derived from that member's credited service and who is re-employed as a permanent full-time employee shall make no additional contributions, nor shall the employer make an equal contribution, and the employee is not eligible for future benefits pursuant § § 3-12-82, 3-12-111 or 3-12-111.1. This section does not apply to any member who is re-employed as a permanent full-time employee or is party to an employment contract as a permanent full-time employee prior to the effective date of this Act. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
